Articles.Content:
Congratulations to Red for becoming the latest member of the KSP Community Moderation team!

If you are unfamiliar with Red Iron Crown, he is one of the most prolific posters in the forum. He is always enlivening conversations and is very knowledgeable about space stuff and is articulate in his responses. He's also been around since 2012, making him a survivor of the April forum disaster.

So let's give Red Iron Crown a good slap on the back!!

PS what would his rep power be if there wasn't a cap on power?

... I didn't get a congratulations thread...

quiet muttering and sulking

Kidding.

Congrats, RIC (I know you don't like that nickname, but eh.)

... I didn't get a congratulations thread...

quiet muttering and sulking

Kidding.

Congrats, RIC (I know you don't like that nickname, but eh.)

I always think of him as Rusty Hat, personally.

Congrats, R.

RIC, good to see them finally make you pull your weight!

Best,

-Slashy
Congratulations, RIC! Best of luck in your moderation career!
Wait what? God took long enough! Hahah, but seriously congrats.

Thank you all for your kind words (and your words, too, vexx32 ). I hope I can live up to your expectations.

Ikaneko, your question prompted me to run the rep calculation on myself. Modesty prevents me from sharing the result, but suffice it to say that no single poster should have that sort of power. The rep power cap is a good thing.

Edited January 9, 2015 by Red Iron Crown
Silly typo, had to fix it after being called "articulate". =)

Congrats.

That crown avatar I made for you many moons ago could use some pazazz. If you'd like something nicer I'd be happy to get some graphics practice.

... I didn't get a congratulations thread...

quiet muttering and sulking

Kidding.

Congrats, RIC (I know you don't like that nickname, but eh.)

It's RICky.

And congrats!
Yey! Finaly your crown is no longer a sign of misleading authority!
Congrats buddy! I say this a million times! you are awesome
Wow. Good job. Brilliant.

Good job my friend, at being better than me.

Alas, Congratulations! It seems like yesterday you only had 3.5x as much rep as me.
on the late like expected by advance like most of the intended time but hey you know ric just ; ) just ; ). woohohohohohohoh xDr

I've seen your rep power and, while considerable, isn't the largest rep power I've seen on a vbulletin forum.

Still, I wouldn't mind have that much rep come my way...

Great job! And good luck Moderating us!

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹You won't make it alive, we are too hard to Moderate.....

No Lol JK
I don't know about RIC, but I've certainly managed to survive for quite a while now. I think it's coming up on a year since I was made a moderator, maybe a bit more.
Wow! congrats. I can't remember the forum without you being around!

I don't know about RIC, but I've certainly managed to survive for quite a while now. I think it's coming up on a year since I was made a moderator, maybe a bit more.

Moderators can't hear the whispers of their downfalls. Not long now.

(Nah, JK.)

At the moment, is anyone else a candidate for the position?

I've heard nothing on the matter. But then, KasperVld never tells us anything until immediately before the fact.

Well, he does if we specifically ask him, but he forgets to tell us, otherwise.

As far as I know, not at present, though. Apart from the need for a few moderators in the International forums, we're pretty well staffed at the moment.
What kind of moderators do you need vexx32? French moderators, polish, spanish etc.
Kaspy mentioned it in this week's devnotes, IIRC. One moment... Polish, Russian, and French, he said.

Ooh! Je parle le francais...euh...un peu...mais je n'ai pas un clavier d'ordinateur avec des accents parce que je parle seulemant anglais sur l'Internet. (I don't have a keyboard with accents because I only speak English on the internet - and my French isn't all it could be as I learned it at home, took German at school and didn't have much to do with French speakers in uni)

Should I apply?

If you can speak/read it fluently, go ahead and speak with Kasper about it.

(I only know English, so don't expect me to be the judge of how good you are in another language.)

Uh, just to let you guys know, I totally had faith in RIC being a moderator since at least November. XD

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/12867-Red-Iron-Crown

(Look at the visitors messages)
